regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests e = re.findall('(?s)value="([^"]*).*?>.*?>.*?>.*?>.*?>.*?>.*?>.*?>([^<]*).*?>.*?>.*?>([^<]*)',page_data) sort = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in e if 'soccermlbstream' not in i[1]] return sort

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR white] [makelist.param2][/COLOR] [COLOR orange][makelist.param3][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param4][/COLOR] VS [COLOR orange][makelist.param5][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param6][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[lists]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6">\s*<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests #e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] #r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] #t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + e + '/' + r + '?origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] t = requests.get('[makelist.param1]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?silver">([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreams' not in i[0]] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Silver'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreams' not in i[0] if 'streamcheck' not in i[0]] return sort + sort1

regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,requests page_data = requests.get('https://crackedstreams.ai/nfl-streams').text r = re.findall('(?s)
\s*.*?>\s*([^<]*)\n', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3],i[4],i[5],i[6],i[7]) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/streams-table/' + url + '/' + 'american-football' + '?new-ui=1&origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) if 'tinyurl' in z: sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] sort1 = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] return sort + sort1 else: sort = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1]] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] ] return sort + sort1

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control from datetime import datetime, timedelta import re,requests current_date = datetime.now() date_format = current_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d") page_data = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/api/nfl-tournaments?date=' + date_format, headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text r = re.findall('(?s)},"id":([^,]*).*?nk":"([^"]*).*?ion":"([^"]*).*?awayTeam":{"name":"([^"]*).*?name":"([^"]*)","logo":"([^"]*).*?ent":"([^"]*).*?ent":"([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace('\\',''),i[2],i[3],i[4],i[5].replace('\\',''),i[6],i[7]) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/streams-table/' + url + '/' + 'american-football' + '?new-ui=1&origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) if 'tinyurl' in z: sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] sort1 = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] return sort + sort1 else: sort = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1]] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] ] return sort + sort1

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re page_data = client.request('https://v2.sportsurge.net/list-nfl') page_data = page_data.split('>NFL - Sportsurge Streams',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('<footer class=',1)[0] #s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?h4>([^<]*).*?h4>.*?h4>([^<]*).*?;">([^<]*)',page_data) s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?tle="([^"]*).*?;">.*?;">.*?;">.*?;">([^<]*)',page_data) #r = [('https://v2.sportsurge.net/'+i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in s] r = [('https://v2.sportsurge.net/'+i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in s] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('[makelist.param1]') r = re.findall('(?s)id="GelecekMaclar">\s*<li class="f1-podium--item ">.*?ef="([^"]*).*?line ">([^<]*)',page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in r if 'Stream East' not in i[1] if 'dudestream' not in i[1] if 'chenstream' not in i[1] if 'NbaStreams' not in i[1] if 'Livefreegame' not in i[1] if 'tvsportslive' not in i[1] if 'bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Dubz Streams' not in i[1] if 'Freetvlive1' not in i[1] if 'NoDelayStream' not in i[1] if 'Sportinglivestreamz' not in i[1] if 'Icelz ' not in i[1] if 'bestnhl.com' not in i[1] if 'papahd' not in i[1] if 'Sports News' not in i[1] if 'sportsio' not in i[1] if 'Streamos' not in i[1] if 'SoccerJumboTV' not in i[1] if 'streamhd247' not in i[1] if 'babysharkstream' not in i[1] if 'Icelz' not in i[1] if 'MyGoodStream' not in i[1] if 'Semensport' not in i[1] if 'Bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Sports24' not in i[1] if 'Yoursports Stream' not in i[1] if 'sportsway' not in i[1] if 'summerstream' not in i[1] if 'RoyStream' not in i[1] if 'BuffStreams' not in i[1] if 'Time4tv' not in i[1]] return sort

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR white] [makelist.param2][/COLOR] [COLOR orange][makelist.param3][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param4][/COLOR] VS [COLOR orange][makelist.param5][/COLOR] [COLOR dodgerblue] [makelist.param6][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[lists]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6">\s*<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + e + '/' + r + '?origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) if 'tinyurl' in z: sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1]) for i in z if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] sort1 = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1]) for i in z if 'tinyurl' in i[0]] return sort + sort1 else: sort = [(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z if 'giveme' in i[0]] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url
